thread.title: Digital Check Introduces New UV Enabled High-Speed TellerScan® TS500 Teller and Branch Capture Check Scanner
thread.title_full: Digital Check Introduces New UV Enabled High-Speed TellerScan® TS500 Teller and Branch Capture Check Scanner

title: Digital Check Introduces New UV Enabled High-Speed TellerScan® TS500 Teller and Branch Capture Check Scanner
text:
Digital Check Introduces New UV Enabled High-Speed TellerScan ® TS500 Teller and Branch Capture Check Scanner October 20, 2015 02:08 PM   
DUBAI, UAE-  GITEX Technology Week – Digital Check ( www.digitalcheck.com ), check capture technology provider to the financial services industry, announces the TellerScan TS500, the newest high-performance check scanner designed to bring bank teller and branch capture operations into the connected era. The high-speed, multi-feed device represents the premier high-end solution for teller-window document scanning, as well as a competitive entry into the branch back-counter and vault capture market. 
The TS500 acts as a countertop hub that consolidates multiple types of information capture, including checks and other branch documents, magnetic stripe cards and ID cards, into a single compact device. The network-enable scanner can also allow the connection of other desktop peripherals such as receipt printers, PIN-pads and more. 
The TS500 ground-up design introduces several new features to make it simpler than ever to operate and maintain. Digital Check’s patented AccuTrac TM Plus feed system automatically aligns checks that are not sitting flat, in order to prevent misfeeds and paper jams, while a first of its kind cleaning system onboard the scanner helps keep the device in top condition with minimal operator intervention. Major design highlights include: Top speed of 200 documents per minute Patent-pending cleaning system Patented AccuTrac TM and AccuTrac TM Plus feed system “Smart” LED diagnostic lights Built-in card/ID scanner with optional magstripe reader Special polymer rollers for longer intervals between cleaning Silent drive belt for lowest noise levels Snap-in, snap-out parts for easy maintenance UV scanning 
“The TS500 scanner is the ideal solution for high-volume scanning applications in bank branches requiring reliable feeding, versatility, ease of operation, and trouble free upkeep,” said Alex Trombetta Digital Check’s Vice President of International Sales. “We are confident that users and channel partners will find it the most performant and user-friendly check scanner we’ve built to date, perfectly complementing our very successful CX30 and TS240 product lines.” 
Customers of the TellerScan TS500 will have access to Digital Check’s unique API features, including the Best-Read ® intelligent thresholding and Special Documents Handling. The new device is compatible with all Remote Deposit, Teller, and Branch systems that use Digital Check’s API version 15.10 or higher. 
Other benefits of the TellerScan TS500 include a small desktop footprint, as well as 600 dpi cameras for scanning items other than checks in high resolution. An optional thermal transaction printer will be available in late 2015. 
For more information about the TellerScan TS500, or to view an interactive demo, visit www.digitalcheck.com/tellerscan-ts500 . 
About Digital Check 
Digital Check is a worldwide technology leader in providing superior check and document scanner products for teller, branch automation, remote deposit capture, and remote lockbox applications. The Northbrook, Ill-based company was named a Bank Technology News’ “Ten Technology Companies to Watch” for its innovative products and received the Innovators Award for their CheXpress CX30 scanner. Digital Check’s SB, BranchXpress®, TellerScan® and award-winning CheXpress® series of electronic scanners are cost-effective and provide high quality images, MICR accuracy and reliability. The company’s scanners are available in over 100 countries worldwide through a network of more than 130 Authorized Solutions Providers and are supported by Digital Check’s comprehensive training, support, warranty and repair services. For more information call 847-446-2285 or visit the company’s website at www.digitalcheck.com . Contacts
